channel.title: James Massucco Blog
channel.description: Updates from my homelab and engineering work

item.title: Google OAuth
item.description: Adding Google authentication for pseudo-admin services like Grafana and Prometheus

item.title: Leveling Up My Blog
item.description: Turning my blog into a dedicated site with a subdomain, a landing page, a separate page for each post. Plus an RSS feed!

item.title: Building a Metrics Dashboard
item.description: FastAPI, htmx, chart.js, and prometheus - oh my! Building a dashboard page with individually refreshing elements for each metric

item.title: Starting a Blog
item.description: How I turned these markdown posts into a static HTML blog

item.title: Building the Homepage
item.description: How I built a simple homepage. Plus, some repo quality-of-life setup

item.title: Security
item.description: Reviewing the security of my setup to ensure my home network is not exposed to hackers

item.title: A Real Website
item.description: Exposing Grafana externally. Plus, some notes about docker deployments

item.title: Provisioning Server + Metrics Monitoring
item.description: Initial server unboxing, OS install, networking, and basic metrics with Prometheus and Grafana

item.title: Starting a Homelab
item.description: Introduction to my homelab project, why I chose to do it, and where I drew inspiration from
